reviews.review: Super fun with friends. Easy to learn for beginners. Playing killer is tough but don't give up. I'm still trash but getting better. DBD community is solid AF and the complete opposite of GTA, COD or Fort. Add me! Merry Christmas everyone!!!!

happy game;)
sad game:(

trickster;o c=8

I've played 270 hours on pc and a little bit on console. Before you by this game just beware, this game is one of a kind. There is really nothing like it expect for Friday the 13th which is also quite fun. In this game you'll be either one of the many survivors or killers, each with a few special perks. They add on to this game about every 3-4 months and the game only gets more complex and fun in time. getting it now will be a good investment in how you play in the future.
Muito bom, graficos otimos, boa jogabilidade, varias parcerias maneiras, ao longo do tempo o jogo fica muito interessante e balanceado, recomendo.

I really enjoy the game even though the community complains a lot. There are some things that Behavior could do better in DBD, but it is all in all an enjoyable game. You may have some jump scares depending on the killer, but I wouldn't describe the game as "scary".

Esse jogo é bom, gosto de como ele funciona ao todo.... Mas ao mesmo tempo chega a ser insuportável os caras que ficam guardando caixão, mas, de resto, o jogo é muito bom. As DLCs na maioria são legais, a atmosfera... Gosto muito dele, o problema são alguns bugs que atrapalham.
It's fun theres just issues with matchmaking at night time especially definitely do research befor playing
when i was playing dead by daylight having a good time until my game crash and when i log in i had to wait 5 hour to play
A very good game but in my opinion a little unbalanced.

Very fun and high skill level without being awful to learn
i suck at the game but it's still really fun to try and get better
Muy buen lobby simulator, el mejor simulador de espera, a veces el lobby cambia por temporada. Recomendadisimo para esperar con tus amigos 👌
很好玩不过玩人必须要和朋友玩，不然就是坐大牢，那些阴间队友不修机逛街躲柜子还不给摸是真的无语
very fun, will take over your life.
L'un des meilleure jeux. Je vous le conseil fortement.

Online multiplayer is terrible. 
As killer you get bullied and taunted. 
As a survivor you get tunneled and taunted. 
The game play as a survivor is repetitive.
If you have 4 friends that you could play this game with, then maybe.
I hate this game. I rate it 5 stars
10 кемпящих бубб с русским ником из 10

Big community. Some matchmaking balancing issues but it has a more gradual learning curve then other games so beginers and competitive players can both have fun. Lots to progress and the perk system is really well thought out and satisfying. Tense for both sides and extremley fun. A little pricey if you want all the content so not great as just a stand alone game but will a couple of extra killers here and there would fully reconmend.

Really fun to play with friends. Can be quite competitive after some time!

Grab this review template here! 👉 https://vojtastruhar.github.io/steam-review-template/

Have you ever been scared and laughed at the same time? No? Then this game is for you! Here the humor and the horror component are one and the same. On one side is a maniac who has to kill survivors, on the other side are survivors who, like poor students, die trying to survive. It's a laugh and a sin...

It's actually a great game. Survive for the Survivors or kill them for the maniac, game on!

I think you can play this game at any given moment... 
I just play a lot for like 1 or 2 months, then I'll be off for 1 or 2 months.
And I play this game since 2016, so this has been going on for the past 5 years.
Very fun for spooking yourself I recommend
honestly such a fun game and better if with friends and meming around
I absolutely love this game. I just wish it wasn’t so glitchy but that doesn’t stop me from playing everyday.
no apto para personas cardiacas jajjajajaj
As miserable a time as playing killer can be...3/4 of the time I am having a blast. The game has its faults but is the best of its kind to this day.

Yes the game does have it flaws, what game doesn't have that.

But overall, I have a lot of fun playing it both as a killer and survivor and its a great game to play with friends.

Le jeux est bon un très bon concept mais il est déséquilibré les dev sont clairement des tueurs trop de perk add-on one shot ils ne gèrent absolument pas la communauté attendez vous à avoir des games sans pouvoir rien faire car le tueur ne bougera pas d'a côté de vous et bien entendu aucun retour sur report 
Côté tueurs c'est le paradis tout les coups sont permis vous risquez pas le ban les dev vous soutiennent dans toute les manière de créez de l'anti-jeu sans compter tout les one shot vous allez avoir quelques mauvaise game car des survivants très expérimentez vous mèneront la vie dur
Bref le jeu est super mais aucune modération de la part des dev par contre pour vous sortir un DLC aucun soucis ;)

fun game that just takes a while to get used to, its quite complicated for some killers like the blight, which is hard to control at many parts, or the huntress where you need to have at least some aim. But in any other parts its pretty simple to play.

Що ж , з останньої рецензії гра змінилась у кращий бік , по-перше, суттєво змінилось з'єднання з сервером , останнім часом не помічав не зрозумілих лагів та нереальних моментів зв'язаних з цим , також не зустрів за тиждень жодного гравця з чіт-программами , маю надію що це не збіг обставин , а нарешті справний анти-чіт , графічна сторона гри теж змінилась , нові мапи , усі нові маніяки та виживачі виглядають дуже красиво , розробники займаються грою  частіше ніж рік тому , принаймні більш детально .
Також хочу звернути увагу на один момент який мені здається зроблений на користь проєкту , раніше гра сприймалась як максимально наближена до кіберспорту , змагальна складова , це те чому розробники приділяли на мою думку більше часу , а тепер гра дійсно починає виглядати як альманах хоррору , увага розробників тепер не сфокусована на одній складовій і розвиток став більш помітним . 

05.07.2022

Absolute garbage, don't buy.

- Very little variance in gameplay, severely limiting the replayability of the game. 
- Clunky as Hell
- Trivial task of repairing generators
- Only one gamemode
- Currently 73,000 users in-game but takes 5 minutes to find a lobby, then puts you in a lobby that isn't full, then takes 5 more minutes to load into the game
- Really annoying perk and item system
- Commonly matched with people, killer or survivor, who lose on purpose

There's almost nothing redeeming about this game, I don't understand how it's so popular. There are better games in the genre.
